text: Vanyo Ivanov (Bulgarian: Ваньо Иванов; born 9 May 2000) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a defender for Sportist Svoge. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Vitosha Bistritsa players Category:PFC Montana players Category:FC Sportist Svoge players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:People from Berkovitsa
title: Vanyo Ivanov
